sentences.sContent: They realized they had wandered into a minefield.
sentences.sCn: 他们意识到自己闯入雷区了。

sentences.sContent: Choosing the right school can be a bit of a minefield.
sentences.sCn: 要选出合适的学校有时有点困难。

synos.tran: 布雷区；充满隐伏危险的事物

trans.tranCn: 布雷区；充满隐伏危险的事物或场合
trans.tranOther: an area where a lot of bombs have been hidden just below the ground or under water
